metadata.title: CVE-2024-35328 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: libyaml v0.2.5 is vulnerable to DDOS. Affected by this issue is thefunction yaml_parser_parse of the file /src/libyaml/src/parser.c.

criterions.comment: libyaml package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
libyaml-libyaml-perl package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
golang-yaml.v2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
